CustomField.description: Two types of status, "In Progress", or "Completed" are available to represent the status of a user's trailmix. While we always expect a value, this is not a required field to enable FLS for trailmix assigners.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Two types of status, "In Progress", or "Completed" are available to represent the status of a user's trailmix.
CustomField.label: Status
